name: 42U Data Center Engineering
tag_list: data-center, consulting, services, energy-efficiency, power, cooling, kvm-over-ip, remote-reboot
overview:
Since 1995, 42U Data Center Services has been providing data center efficiency solutions for data center and facilities managers including cooling and power infrastructure, best-practice advice, and other energy efficiency technology solutions.

42U’s team of technology specialists provide unbiased, independent, energy efficiency consulting and solutions. 42U has deep energy efficiency and technical expertise in data center infrastructure systems, including cooling, enclosures, management, monitoring and power. Partnering with leading data center infrastructure equipment manufacturers, 42U provides best-practice-based consulting and products for data center builds, expansions and consolidations. Since 1995, a majority of the Fortune 500 companies have engaged 42U to resolve their data center challenges and improve data center efficiency.
